name: Foil Turning 3D
description:
Oh, sooo shiny…but what could it be? Create unique masterpieces from foil in Foil Turning 3D!

Hammer? Check. Foil? Check. Then it’s time to create.

Here’s how to play:
1. Grab the foil and mold it into fantastic shapes using that mallet.
2. Got what you want? Great! Now it’s time to get polishing. No one likes rough edges, after all. Sand it down so that it’s nice and smooth. Good job!
3. Now, time to paint it. What’s life without a little color, after all? Choose between reds, blues, purples, and more.

And you’re done! Now it’s time to sit back and enjoy your creation.

Download Foil Turning 3D today and enjoy a creative and relaxing game at your fingertips.
